TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BindingGroup extends System.Windows.DependencyObject

summary.span: 包含绑定集合和用于验证对象的 对象。

span.span: Contains a collection of bindings and objects that are used to validate an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A创建多个绑定，它可以验证并一起更新之间的关系。A creates a relationship between multiple bindings, which can be validated and updated together. 例如，假设应用程序将提示用户输入的地址。For example, suppose that an application prompts the user to enter an address. 然后，应用程序填充类型的对象`Address`，其中具有属性， `Street`， `City`， `ZipCode`，和`Country`，与用户提供的值。The application then populates an object of type `Address`, which has the properties, `Street`, `City`, `ZipCode`, and `Country`, with the values that the user provided. 应用程序具有包含四个面板控件，其中每个被数据绑定到对象的属性之一。The application has a panel that contains four controls, each of which is data bound to one of the object’s properties. 你可以使用中验证`Address`对象。You can use a in a to validate the `Address` object. 如果绑定参与相同，你可确保邮政编码的有效地址的国家/地区。If the bindings participate in the same , you can ensure that the zip-code is valid for the country of the address. 你设置属性或。You set the property on or . 子元素继承从其父元素，就像使用任何其他可继承的属性。Child elements inherit the from their parent elements, just as with any other inheritable property. 上的子代元素的绑定添加到如果发生以下情况之一：A binding on a descendent element is added to a if one of the following situations occurs: - 绑定的源和具有的元素的相同的对象和未设置属性。The binding's source and the of the element that has the are the same object and the property is not set. - 绑定属性等同于的和它们未显式设置为`null`。The property of the binding is equal to the of the and they are not explicitly set to `null`. 在地址的示例中，假设的设置类型的对象为`Address`。In the example of the address, suppose that the of the is set to the object of type `Address`. 每个绑定添加到的面板。The binding for each is added to the of the panel. 你添加对象添加到。You add objects to a . 作为的第一个参数传递方法时运行。The is passed as the first parameter of the method when the runs. 你可以使用或方法，若要获取的对象的建议的值和要获取的绑定源属性。You can use the or method on that to get the proposed values of the object, and the property to get the sources of the bindings. A更新在同一时间而不是分别更新每个绑定的绑定源。A updates the sources of the binding at the same time instead of each binding being updated separately. 当调用其中一个用于验证数据的方法 (， ，或)，每个绑定中示例经过验证，并且可能会更新。When you call one of the methods to validate the data (, , or ), the binding for each in the example is validated and potentially updated. 如果绑定是属于，直到你调用未更新绑定源或上，除非你显式设置属性。When a binding is part of a , the source of the binding is not updated until you call or on the , unless you explicitly set the property. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的应用程序会提示用户输入的描述和价格的项以及优惠过期的日期。The following examples create an application that prompts the user to enter the description and price of an item and the date that the offer expires. 应用程序将显示窗体下的项的当前信息。The application displays the current information for the item below the form. 用户可以提交或取消所做的更改。The user can submit or cancel the changes. 应用程序执行以下操作来实现此行为。The application does the following to achieve this behavior. - 创建并将其添加根创建时[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的应用程序。Creates a and adds it the root when it creates the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] of the application. - 调用， ，和中启用的应用程序的逻辑回滚做的更改。Calls , , and in the application's logic to enable rolling back changes. - 调用中方法以获取用户的输入，然后检查超过 100 美元的项至少为七天中是否可用。Calls in a method to get the user's input and then check that an item over 100 dollars is available for at least seven days. 下面的示例创建[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的应用程序。The following example creates the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] of the application. 根具有包含来验证该项目，如前面所述。The root has a that contains a that validates the item, as described previously. 上的绑定对象`Price`属性和`OfferExpires`的属性变得一部分和每个绑定都具有若要确保价格和日期，分别是有效的值。The binding objects on the `Price` property and the `OfferExpires` property become part of the and each binding has a to make sure that price and date, respectively, are valid values. 各个属性的验证规则之前运行上。The validation rules for the individual properties run before the on the . [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#WindowLayout](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#windowlayout)] 下面的示例演示应用程序的事件处理程序。The following example shows the event handlers for the application. 当用户单击提交按钮时，在应用程序调用来分别运行关联。When the user clicks the Submit button, the application calls to run each that is associated with the . 如果每个成功，保存对该对象的值，并结束编辑事务。If each succeeds, saves the values to the object and ends the edit transaction. 如果是成功，则应用程序将开始另一个编辑事务。If is successful, the application begins another edit transaction. 当失败，事件发生，因为应用程序设置到`true`上（在前面的示例）。When a fails, the event occurs because the application set to `true` on the (in the previous example). `ItemError` 句柄事件，并显示有关用户的验证错误的信息。`ItemError` handles the event and displays information about the validation error to the user. 该示例还处理事件和事件**取消**按钮。The example also handles the event for the and the event for the **Cancel** button. [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#WindowLogic](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#windowlogic)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#WindowLogic](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#windowlogic)] 下面的示例演示了自定义 `ValidateDateAndPrice`，它被添加到中第一个示例。The following example shows the custom `ValidateDateAndPrice`, which was added to the in the first example. 使用中其方法以获取用户输入到窗体中，然后检查如果项是超过 100 美元，是否将至少为七天的值。The uses the in its method to get the values the user entered into the form, and checks that if an item is over 100 dollars, it will be available for at least seven days. [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#ValidateObject](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Data.cs#validateobject)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#ValidateObject](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/data.vb#validateobject)]

summary.span: 开始 中源上的编辑事务。

span.span: Begins an edit transaction on the sources in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在源支持放弃挂起的更改，你可以调用若要开始编辑事务，调用若要保存挂起的更改，请调用可以放弃挂起的更改。If the sources in the support discarding pending changes, you can call to begin the edit transaction, call to save the pending changes, call to discard the pending changes. 中每个对象实现，调用 For each object in that implements , calls ## Examples 下面的示例调用窗口加载时若要开始编辑事务。The following example calls when a window loads to begin the edit transaction. remarks.format: ## Remarks A属于如果发生以下情况之一：A belongs to a if one of the following cases occurs: - 绑定的源和具有的元素的相同的对象和未设置。The binding's source and the of the element that has the are the same object and the is not set. - 绑定属性和的设置为相同的非 null 值和所属的绑定目标元素的父元素。The property of the binding and the of the are set to the same non-null value and the belongs to a parent element of the binding's target element. - 你添加到。You add a to .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CancelEdit() cil managed

summary.span: 结束编辑事务并放弃挂起的更改。

span.span: Ends the edit transaction and discards the pending changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使源放弃挂起的更改，如果源对象是能够执行此操作并结束编辑事务。This method causes the sources to discard the pending changes, if a source object is capable of doing so and end the edit transaction. 然后该方法使用保存的源值更新目标属性。Then the method updates the target properties with the saved source values. 中每个对象实现，调用 For each object in that implements , calls ## Examples 下面的示例调用可以放弃挂起的更改，然后调用准备要重新编辑的源。The following example calls to discard the pending changes and then calls to prepare the source to be re-edited. [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#CancelEdit](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#canceledit)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#CancelEdit](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#canceledit)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool CommitEdit() cil managed

summary.span: 运行所有 对象，并且在所有验证规则都成功时，更新绑定源。

span.span: Runs all the objects and updates the binding sources if all validation rules succeed.

returns.span: 如果每个 都成功且将值提交到了源，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if every succeeds and the values are committed to the sources; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果每个成功，此方法使源提交挂起的更改并结束编辑事务，如果源对象是能够执行此操作。If every succeeds, this method causes the sources to commit the pending changes and end the edit transaction, if a source object is capable of doing so. 中每个对象实现，调用 For each object in that implements , calls ## Examples 下面的示例调用保存挂起的更改，然后调用准备要重新编辑的源。The following example calls to save the pending changes and then calls to prepare the source to be re-edited. [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#BeginEdit](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#beginedit)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#BeginEdit](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#beginedit)]

param.name: propertyName
param.span: 要获取其建议值的属性。

span.span: The property whose proposed value to get.

summary.span: 返回指定的属性和项的建议值。

span.span: Returns the proposed value for the specified property and item.
The proposed property value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法在方法以获取要将其提交到源的值。Use this method in the method to get the value to be committed to the source. 返回值的类型取决于从该处阶段时发生。The type of the return value depends on the stage at which the occurs. 例如，如果数据绑定到整数类型的属性和调用具有其设置为，该方法返回一个字符串。For example, if a is data bound to a property of type integer and the that calls has its set to , the method returns a string. 如果具有其设置为，该方法返回绑定的转换器返回任何类型。If the has its set to , the method returns whatever type that is returned by the binding's converter. 在此示例中，通常返回一个整数。In this example, usually returns an integer. ## Examples 下面的示例是应用的提示用户输入多个客户，并将销售代表分配给每个客户的一部分。The following example is part of an application that prompts the user to enter multiple customers and assign a sales representative to each customer. 应用程序将检查销售代表和客户属于同一区域。The application checks that the sales representative and the customer belong to the same region. 示例所示方法，它使用方法以获取客户输入的值。The example shows the method, which uses the method to get values that the customer entered. [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#ItemBindGroupValidationRule](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window2.xaml.cs#itembindgroupvalidationrule)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#ItemBindGroupValidationRule](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/window2.xaml.vb#itembindgroupvalidationrule)]

exception.span: 指定项和属性之间没有绑定。

span.span: There is not a binding for the specified item and property.

exception.span: 由于转换错误或早期验证规则失败，指定的属性值不可用。

span.span: The value of the specified property is not available, due to a conversion error or because an earlier validation rule failed.

summary.span: 获取 中的绑定对象所使用的源。

span.span: Gets the sources that are used by the Binding objects in the .

value.span: 中的绑定对象所使用的源。

span.span: The sources that are used by the Binding objects in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用作源添加到每个对象属性一次，即使该对象用作多个绑定源。Each object that is used as a source is added into the property once, even if the object is used as the source for multiple bindings. 通常情况下，没有中的只有一项，即是对象使用的元素。Often, there is just one item in , which is the object that is the of the element that uses the . 之所以但是具有多个源。It is possible for a to have multiple sources, however. 例如，如果绑定对象共用同一个但使用不同的源对象，作为源使用每个对象都在。For example, if Binding objects share the same but use different source objects, each object that is used as a source is in . 也可以在多个对象如果绑定的路径被解析为嵌套的属性的源。There can also be multiple objects in if the path of a Binding resolves to a nested property of the source. 例如，假设控件的绑定是的一部分及其是`Customer`具有类型的属性的对象`Address`。For example, suppose a control's binding is a part of a and its is a `Customer` object, which has a property of type `Address`. 如果的是`Address.ZipCode`属性，`Address`添加到属性。If the of the is the `Address.ZipCode` property, the `Address` is added to the property. ## Examples 以下示例是应用的检查用户是否已设置为相等的值的两个对象的属性的一部分。The following examples are part of an application that checks whether the user has set the properties of two objects to equal values. 第一个示例创建两个控件，其中每个被数据绑定到不同的源。The first example creates two controls, each of which are data bound to a different source. 第一个绑定获取它的源， `object1`，从的控件的父元素 ( )。The binding of the first gets its source, `object1`, from the of the control's parent element (the ). 在第二个，绑定源设置为`object2`。On the second , the source of the binding is set to `object2`. 此示例还创建显示验证错误。The example also creates a that displays validation errors. [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroupName](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window3.xaml#bindinggroupname)] [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#ValidationAdornerSite](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window3.xaml#validationadornersite)] 下面的示例演示前面的示例使用。The following example shows the that the previous example uses. 在方法，此示例获取从每个源对象并检查对象的属性是否相等。In the method, the example gets each source object from the and checks whether the properties of the objects are equal. [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroupNameValidationRule](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window3.xaml.cs#bindinggroupnamevalidationrule)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroupNameValidationRule](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/window3.xaml.vb#bindinggroupnamevalidationrule)]

summary.span: 获取或设置标识 的名称，该名称可用于在 中包括和排除绑定对象。

span.span: Gets or sets the name that identifies the , which can be used to include and exclude Binding objects in the .
The name that identifies the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`null`，这些绑定具有的是与相同的对象的源，具有的元素的参与。If is `null`, bindings that have a source that is the same object as the of the element that has the participate in the . 你可以包含具有不同于源的绑定具有的父元素的通过设置的和的一种绑定到相同的值的属性。You can include bindings that have a source that is different from the of the parent element that has the by setting of the and the property of a binding to the same value. 你可以排除具有相同的源的绑定具有的父元素的通过设置的和的一种绑定到不同的值的属性。You can exclude bindings that have the same source as of the parent element that has the by setting of the and the property of a binding to different values. ## Examples 以下示例是应用的检查用户是否已设置为相等的值的两个对象的属性的一部分。The following examples are part of an application that checks whether the user has set the properties of two objects to equal values. 第一个示例创建两个控件，其中每个被数据绑定到不同的源。The first example creates two controls, each of which are data bound to a different source. 第一个绑定属于因为继承和从其父级。The binding of the first is part of the because the inherits the and from its parent . 在第二个绑定属于因为的和的都设置为`bindingGroup`。The binding on the second is part of the because the of the and the of the are both set to `bindingGroup`. [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroupName](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window3.xaml#bindinggroupname)] [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#ValidationAdornerSite](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window3.xaml#validationadornersite)] 下面的示例演示前面的示例使用。The following example shows the that the previous example uses. 在方法，此示例获取从每个源对象并检查对象的属性是否相等。In the method, the example gets each source object from the and checks whether the properties of the objects are equal. [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroupNameValidationRule](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window3.xaml.cs#bindinggroupnamevalidationrule)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroupNameValidationRule](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/window3.xaml.vb#bindinggroupnamevalidationrule)]

span.span: if the reuses target values that have not been committed to the source; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议的值为一个值，已更改的一个绑定，在目标上但尚未提交到源。A proposed value is a value that has been changed on the target of a binding, but has not been committed to the source. 例如，假设上是一个双向绑定和属性设置为。For example, suppose that there is a two-way binding on a and the property is set to . 如果用户更改的值，建议的值是中的值才会提交到源。If the user changes the value of the , the proposed value is the value that is in the before it is committed to source. 当是`true`、时绑定离开 BindingGroup 和另一个绑定，具有相同的源联接 BindingGroup 使用建议的值。When is `true`, the uses the proposed value when one binding leaves the BindingGroup and another Binding with the same source joins the BindingGroup. 例如，假设应用程序使用户可以编辑多个字段并通过单击一个按钮更新源对象。For example, suppose that an application enables a user to edit multiple fields and update the source object by clicking a button. 当不编辑字段时，应用程序将显示在。When a field is not being edited, the application displays it in a . 当用户开始编辑字段时，该应用程序将替换与。When the user begins to edit a field, the application replaces the with a . 当用户完成编辑该字段时，该应用程序将替换与。When the user finishes editing that field, the application replaces the with a . 因为源还未更新，直到用户单击按钮时，必须有一种方法以显示建议的值。Because the source is not updated until the user clicks the button, there must be a way for the to display the proposed value. 通过设置到`true`，应用程序将向字段显示用户的更改，即使尚未更新源。By setting to `true`, the application will display the user's changes to a field even when the source has not been updated.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool TryGetValue (object item, string propertyName, out object value);

summary.span: 尝试获取指定属性和项的建议值。

span.span: Attempts to get the proposed value for the specified property and item.

returns.span: 如果值为指定属性的建议值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if value is the proposed value for the specified property; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回`false`如果不存在指定的项和属性的绑定的指定属性的值不可用，由于转换错误或者因为早期的验证规则失败。 returns `false` if there is not a binding for the specified item and property or if the value of the specified property is not available, due to a conversion error or because an earlier validation rule failed. 使用此方法在方法以获取要将其提交到源的值。Use this method in the method to get the value to be committed to the source. 类型`value`取决于从该处阶段时发生。The type `value` depends on the stage at which the occurs. 例如，如果被数据绑定到的整数类型，属性`value`是一个字符串，如果调用具有其设置为。For example, if a is data bound to a property of type integer, `value` is a string if the that calls has its set to . 如果具有其设置为的一种`value`是任何类型，它由绑定的转换器。If the has its set to , the type of `value` is whatever type that is returned by the binding's converter. 在此示例中，`value`通常是一个整数。In this example, `value` is usually an integer. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个自定义名为`ValidateDateAndPrice`。The following example creates a custom named `ValidateDateAndPrice`. 在方法，该示例使用方法和属性来获取用户输入到窗体中的值。In the method, the example uses the method and the property to get the values the user entered into the form. 然后该示例检查是否项是超过 100 美元，是否将至少为七天。Then the example checks that if an item is over 100 dollars, it will be available for at least seven days. 此示例摘自的更大的示例在类This example is part of a larger example on the class [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#ValidateObject](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Data.cs#validateobject)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#ValidateObject](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/data.vb#validateobject)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool UpdateSources() cil managed

summary.span: 如果所有验证规则都成功，则对绑定和将 属性设置为 、 或 的 对象运行转换器，并将目标值保存到源对象。

span.span: Runs the converter on the binding and the objects that have the property set to , , or and saves the values of the targets to the source objects if all the validation rules succeed.

returns.span: 如果所有验证规则都成功，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if all validation rules succeed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法更新源，如果每个成功，但它不会导致源挂起的更改提交并结束编辑事务。This method updates the source if every succeeds, but it does not cause the sources to commit the pending changes and end the edit transaction. 也就是说，如果源对象实现。That is, if the source object implements . 调用此方法不会导致调用。Calling this method does not cause to be called. 使用方法，让提交挂起的更改的源。Use the method to have the sources commit the pending changes. ## Examples 下面的示例是应用的提示用户输入多个客户，并将销售代表分配给每个客户的一部分。The following example is part of an application that prompts the user to enter multiple customers and assign a sales representative to each customer. 应用程序将检查销售代表和客户属于同一区域。The application checks that the sales representative and the customer belong to the same region. 该示例通过调用验证绑定并将值保存到源，如果所有验证规则都成功。The example calls to validate the bindings and save the values to the source if all the validation rules succeed. [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#UpdateSources](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window2.xaml.cs#updatesources)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#UpdateSources](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/window2.xaml.vb#updatesources)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当添加到、中的第一个参数作为传递方法。When a is added to a , the is passed in as the first parameter of the method. 你可以通过获取对象的建议的值或方法。You can get the proposed values of the object by using the or method. 你可以从绑定源的对象属性。You can get the objects that are the sources of the bindings from the property. ## Examples 下面的示例添加自定义，`ValidateDateAndPrice`到。The following example adds the custom , `ValidateDateAndPrice`, to the . [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroup](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#bindinggroup)] 下面的示例展示了 `ValidateDateAndPrice` 类。The following example shows the `ValidateDateAndPrice` class. 方法使用获取用户输入到窗体中，然后检查如果项是超过 100 美元，是否将至少为七天的值。The method uses the to get the values the user entered into the form, and checks that if an item is over 100 dollars, it will be available for at least seven days.
